title: Still no key fragments.... :(
body: Guys...i cant anymore..i cant get a key..i dont have ban or something..i got my last key 2 weeks ago i have good skins in loot and i want to get them but need more essence so i have to open chest BUT I CANT.. rito plz {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.

Riot wanted to give players who didn't play as frequently a good drop rate for keys, without making it feel like farming was mandatory if you wanted keys.

 
Note: There's currently a bug which prevents you from earning key fragments if you're playing a champion you don't own. This is unintended, and a solution for this is being worked on.

so there is a bug that u can earn keys playing with not owned champs?

Correct, there is a bug that can prevent you from earning *key fragments* while playing champions you *do not own*. We're looking into a fix for this, but one hasn't been found yet.

As mentioned by *Rineyy*, after ~30 days after your first fragment your drop-rate should reset. Let me know if you have any additional questions.
